channel.title: New Team System 2008 Virtual PC to Download
channel.description: UPDATE: Just heard from Brian Randell that the VPC is now ready to download. Updated links are below. Anthony Borton just pointed out to me that the new version of the Team System evaluation VPC is available. The Virtual PC...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by El Guapo+00:00
item.description:
Hello,
Can I upgrade it in-place if I purchase a Team Server license?
